A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am very surprised anyone would give this a bad review.  I saw it opening night (12/14/2017).  I was impressed with how well written this is.  There were some surprises and I liked how well thought out it was.

The only negative is the movie is too long at 2 hours 30 mins.  Also\, I found it odd there were no light saber battles the first 2 hours\, then the last 30 mins there's a ton of light saber battles.  Definately don't leave to use the bathroom at the end.

Overall I would say this is one of the best Star Wars movies.  Better than Rogue One.  Maybe better than the originals.
